comments.body: TODO to take apiserver audiences at `TokenAuthenticator ` construction time, and if ctx is audience-limited, ensure it intersects with the apiserver audiences, and echo an audience in the response

accumulating into a sets.NewString() would dedupe automatically for you

```go
groups := sets.NewString(bootstrapapi.BootstrapDefaultGroup)

if additionalGroups := getSecretString(secret, bootstrapapi.BootstrapTokenExtraGroupsKey); len(additionalGroups) > 0 {
  ...
} 

return groups.List(), nil
```
+1, de-duping seems like a good idea.
Don't know if this is the correct verbosity level. It was the existing one taken from `isSecretExpired`.
